sentences.en: All babies look flat-footed and when they walk the whole sole touches the ground.
sentences.cn: 婴儿们看上去都是平足，他们走路的时候整个脚掌都着地。

sentences.en: Griffiths is the sole survivor of the crash.
sentences.cn: 格里菲思是此次撞车事故唯一的幸存者。

sentences.en: He held a sole tenancy of a flat.
sentences.cn: 他单独租用一套房间.

sentences.en: He is the sole importer of this product, and he certainly thinks he's onto a winner.
sentences.cn: 作为该产品唯一的进口商, 他当然觉得销路一定很好.

sentences.en: He was the sole proprietor with total management control.
sentences.cn: 他是唯一业主，掌握全部管理权。

sentences.en: Her sole aim is personal aggrandizement.
sentences.cn: 她唯一的目的就是扩大个人权势。

sentences.en: I wear my old shoes every day. One sole has come unglued.
sentences.cn: 我每天都穿那双旧鞋，有一只鞋底已经脱胶了。

sentences.en: I'm the sole victim of Mother's tyranny.
sentences.cn: 我是唯一受母亲严加管制的人。

sentences.en: leather soles
sentences.cn: 皮质鞋底

sentences.en: My sole purpose is to help you.
sentences.cn: 我唯一的目的是帮助你.

sentences.en: Practice is the sole criterion for testing truth.
sentences.cn: 实践是检验真理的唯一标准.

sentences.en: Rafferty was the sole survivor from the successful Ireland team of 1988.
sentences.cn: 拉弗蒂是1988年红极一时的爱尔兰队硕果仅存的球员。

sentences.en: She is my sole trust.
sentences.cn: 她是我惟一信赖的人.

sentences.en: The nail pierced through the sole of his shoes into his foot.
sentences.cn: 那颗钉子穿透了鞋底,扎进他的脚.

sentences.en: The plaintiff's sole witness, a gambler and layabout, was easily discredited.
sentences.cn: 原告唯一的证人嗜赌成性，游手好闲，其证词一下子就被推翻了。

sentences.en: the sole American in the room
sentences.cn: 房间里唯一的美国人

sentences.en: the sole surviving member of the family
sentences.cn: 那一家唯一在世的成员

sentences.en: the soles of her shoes
sentences.cn: 她鞋子的鞋底

sentences.en: The soles of his feet were caked in mud.
sentences.cn: 他的脚掌上沾满了泥巴。

sentences.en: The story was published with the sole purpose of selling newspapers.
sentences.cn: 刊登这则报道的目的纯粹是为了推销报纸。

sentences.en: We have been appointed sole UK distributor of a number of Hungarian wines.
sentences.cn: 我们获委托为若干种类的匈牙利酒在英国的独家经销商.

words.tran_cn: 唯一的；[法]单独的；仅有的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 总代理商；独家经营商；包销人
独家经销商；独家发行人

trans.tran_cn: 单独的，唯一的，专有的，独占的
trans.tran_en: the sole person, thing etc is the only one

trans.tran_cn: 鞋底，有…底的 -soled，脚底，鳎（可食用比目鱼）
trans.tran_en: the bottom surface of your foot, especially the part you walk or stand on
